I don't normally comment. I have been here, on the bay, for a while. I can honestly say that this copy is sub par. While I appreciate the up and the work that goes into it, I just don't think it's worth it. I can handle cams, web rips, ect. But this pos is one of the worst copies I have ever seen. Video quality is ok but it stutters throughout the whole movie. And about the audio. I agree with others saying that the quality is about as good as a cam. I got about 30mins into it and had to turn it off. Like I said, I really appreciate the up by Hero and the hard work that goes into everything, it's just not worth it this time.

Oh and
V: 4 for the skipping
A: 6 for the subs and bad quality
